page.title: 04The Community Policeman
page.content: The{Community Policeman}not only visits schools but also attends{Parish {Council Meetings}and{Local Youth {Clubs.}He is a source of information of{criminals}residing in his area. The policeman interviewed is responsible for two Primary and one Comprehensive School, and for{elderly residents, getting to know them and making periodic visits to their homes, especially during winter months if they live alone. His role is: {1.}To prevent crime by advising people on security. {2.}To educate residents as to what is legal and what is not. {3.}To prosecute those that break the law. The Community Policeman is in the front line of the three tier system meeting the public daily, getting good contact in order to keep law and order
